About Academic Projects Blog CV

SeongHyun Kristine Seo

AI/ML Researcher | Data Scientist | Applied Scientist

I’m an aspiring AI/ML researcher grounded in scientific and statistical reasoning, focused on extracting insights from real-world data. My goal is to build reliable, data-driven systems for industrial applications that support sustainable and autonomous AI—especially in manufacturing. I’m particularly interested in quality and process control and automation across steel, chemical materials, and aerospace production.
Currently, I’m an AI/ML Researcher Intern at Boeing AI (BKETC, Seoul).

Research interests:
  • Time-series forecasting (incl. multimodal time series)
  • Statistical process control and planning (incl. VLMs)
  • Post-deployment model maintenance (monitoring, retraining, MLOps)
